long_description: The prAna Bhakti Yoga bag conveniently carries and protects your yoga mat. Attractive quilted design stands up to regular use and is comfortable to carry. Load your yoga mat through the top or use the side zipper; yoga mat sold separately. Side stash pocket; adjustable shoulder strap. Closeout.
short_description: The prAna Bhakti Yoga bag conveniently carries and protects your yoga mat. Attractive quilted design stands up to regular use and is comfortable to carry.
